name: ZedRun
description:
Run and Gun Platformer where you can either run or gun your way through each level. The zombies are weak minded, but deadly to the touch. With your trusty fully automatic personal defense weapon, you are ready to take on the hoards and make your escape! 

Big Thanks to Shaun Spalding and his awesome platformer tutorial. It was a great with teaching the tools and coding language of Game Maker Studio 2 and is defiantly worth checking out if you're interesting in making a platformer like this! 

Be on the look out for updates in the future, with more levels, and abilities, and guns surly on the way!
